title: Military Gamers United
body:
Sound off. We are looking for a few good men. If you are active duty , retired , or prior service of any U.S. Armed Forces we would like to recruit you for ranked or casual. Military spouse and gf's are welcomed to join as long as said military person is a member. It dosnt matter if you play ranked or non ranked we would like to welcome you to group. Once we get enough members we will be starting a FB page and a discord chat.

Stay frosty
Cpl Krick USMC 0311
2004 -2012

I am not in the military, but I have family members in the national guard and the navy.  I am looking for a nice community to play league and have fun.  ign is madiiiman

im sorry to say but this is for military gamers only, we need a home so we can can let loose and be ourself and not have to worry about being hated or offending some one because we are in the military
you guys wouldnt offend me, but ok
